text: Counsellor at Law is a 1933 American drama movie directed by William Wyler and is based on the play of the same name by Elmer Rice. It stars John Barrymore, Melvyn Douglas, Bebe Daniels, Doris Kenyon, Thelma Todd, Onslow Stevens, Vincent Sherman and was distributed by Universal Pictures. ==Other websites== * * Category:1933 drama movies Category:1930s American drama movies Category:Movies based on plays Category:Movies directed by William Wyler
title: Counsellor at Law
